drivers.name: stc300X.upp
drivers.comments: UPP files of this driver: stc300bl.upp, stc300bm.upp, stc300.upp

drivers.name: stcanyX.upp
drivers.comments:
For all Epson Stylus Color printers, 360dpi and 720dpi color on plain paper only.

UPP files of this driver: stcany.upp, stcany_h.upp

drivers.name: stcolor
drivers.comments: This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

notes:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Color 300.

Works partially with the ghostscript 5.10 stcany.upp and stc2.upp drivers and -sDEVICE=stcolor -dMicroweave. The printout is readable but not good.

Glenn Ramsey wrote a set of "stc300" uniprint drivers, they are available in GNU/AFPL/ESP Ghostscript 7.05 and newer.

It probably does not work with Gimp-Print.

Consumables/Refills: Ink cartridge (Epson P/N SO20138)
